R
0 is linked to the transmission rate, β, through the expression β( t) = R
0 ( t)/ D. To account for potential differences in transmission rates among locales (e.g. due to differences in mixing patterns), we multiplied the citywide value by an adjustment factor, f
i for the ith locale, to compute the locale-specific transmission rate β
i = f
i
β( t).
